narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Dayton Osteopathic Hospital is a General Acute Care Hospital provider based in Dayton, OH. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $111.3M in Medicaid payments across 2.5M claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: This provider received $111.3M in taxpayer-funded Medicaid payments — enough to fund healthcare for approximately 13,908 Medicaid beneficiaries for a full year at average per-enrollee costs.
